column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column182: For all Agricultural Districts Chapter 205 includes the following statement "including clusters of single-family farm dwellings permitted within agricultural parks developed by the State." All dwellings, including the primary dwelling, must be occupied by people who will operate the agricultural enterprise.

column182: Setbacks, minimum individual lot sizes, etc are not specified in a project district. In the APD, there's a density guideline, but it's up to the interpretation of the project by the board. The intent is a master-planned, singularly owned sub-jurisdiction that offers a transition between developed communities and agricultural land

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column182: Parking requirements: possibly 0 for SFH if dwelling density is lower than 1 unit per 1,000 square feet of land, offsite parking may be acceptable; 3/4+ Housing - permitted with a maximum density of five hundred square feet of land area per rentable unit or dwelling unit; Setbacks - 0 except as required by plan approval; Parking - The number of parking spaces required for double-family, duplex and multiple-family residential dwellings having a density greater than one thousand square feet of land area per rentable unit or dwelling unit within the CDH zoning district shall be one off-street parking space per unit; 3/4+ parking - one for each unit on a property maintaining a unit density higher than one thousand square feet of land area per rentable unit or dwelling unit.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column182: 3/4+-Housing - permitted provided that the maximum density shall be one thousand two hundred fifty square feet of land area per rentable unit or dwelling unit; The height limit in the City of Hilo shall be one hundred twenty feet; Side yards, , except where the adjoining building site is in an RS, RD, RM or RCX district. Where the side yard adjoins the side yard of a building site in an RS, RD, RM or RCX district, there shall be a side yard which conforms to the side yard requirements for dwelling use of the adjoining district. In ANY commercial district, ADU treatment is permissible if and only if the residential use is needed for the commercial operation (e.g., caretaker units)

column182: Any uses permitted either directly or conditionally in the RS, RD, RM, RCX, CN, CG, CV or V districts shall be permitted in a project district; provided, that each of the proposed uses and the overall densities for residential and hotel uses shall be contained in a master plan for the project district and in the project district enabling ordinance.

column10: Residential-Commercial Mixed Use Districts - 10,000 square feet
column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column182: Where commercial uses are integrated with residential uses in the RCX district, pedestrian access to the dwelling shall be independent from other uses and shall be designed to enhance privacy for residents; No floor of any building in the RCX district shall be used for both dwelling and commercial purposes; There may be more than one main building on any building site in the RCX district; Distance between main buildings on the same building site in the RCX district shall be at least fifteen feet., Side yards, eight feet for a one-story building, plus an additional two feet for each additional story.

column182: 3/4+ Housing - for currently enrolled university students and their dependents and for current university employees and their dependents; The minimum building site area for leased lots shall be seven thousand five hundred square feet.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column182: Height: Hilo = 125ft, Keauhou Bay = 90ft, Kahaluu Bay= 90ft; In case any of the permitted uses have dormitories, two beds shall be equivalent to one separate rentable unit for purposes related to the required land area in the V district; Side yards, eight feet for one story, and an additional two feet for each additional story.
